about-me-title: ABOUT ME: WHO AM I AND WHAT DO I DO?
about-me-paragraph-1: My name is Willy Emanuel Antunez Gonzales and I live in Tegucigalpa, the capital of Honduras.
about-me-paragraph-2: I am a Web Developer with expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Redux, SCSS, Git+GitHub, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, among other tools.
about-me-paragraph-3: With these skills, I am capable of developing comprehensive solutions in the field of web development. I am a self-taught individual committed to learning new things that help me perform better in my professional field.
skills-paragraph: Among my technical skills, my ability for full-stack web development stands out, primarily using JavaScript-based tools for both client-side and server-side development.
frontend-skills-paragraph: I have experience in developing web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Redux, SCSS, and other tools.
backend-skills-paragraph: I have experience in developing web applications on the backend using Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and other tools.
design-skills-paragraph: I have knowledge of design tools that complement my frontend development, such as prototyping in Figma, creating and editing vector graphics with Adobe Illustrator, and editing and retouching images using Photoshop.
others-skills-paragraph: I have experience using Git+GitHub/Bitbucket for version control and I have knowledge of Scrum that I have applied in my work experience, among others.
